skilllist.skilldesc: Each time Jawhead deals damage to an enemy hero or a Creep, he inflicts a stack of Mecha Suppression on them for 3s (up to 6 stacks). Each stack of Mecha Suppression increases all damage dealt to the target by 2%.

Jawhead launches up to 12 missiles at random nearby enemies over 5s, each missile dealing 135<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the enemy hit.

Jawhead gains 30% Movement Speed and a 500<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> shield for 5s.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Jawhead flings the nearest unit (prioritizes heroes) to the target location, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area and stunning them for 0.5s. Can be used on allied heroes and they will not take damage.

Jawhead charges into the target enemy hero, dealing 350<font color="fba51f"> (+150% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and briefly stunning them. Enemies around the target are knocked back and dealt the same amount of damage. Jawhead is immune to control effects during the charge.

data.name: Jawhead

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.

+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1:
Conceal: <font color="ffe63c">Blessing:</font> Continue to gain Gold (limit: 1500) through Roaming Equipment to keep enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Conceal</font>(current: <font color="ffe63c"> (+1 Roaming Gold)</font>)!
Active: Nearby allied heroes enter Camouflage State and their Movement Speed increases by <font color="ffe63c"> (+0.04 Roaming Gold)</font>% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage ends this state.
equiplist.equipskill2: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill6: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Conceal: <font color="ffe63c">Blessing:</font> Continue to gain Gold (limit: 1500) through Roaming Equipment to keep enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Conceal</font>(current: <font color="ffe63c"> (+1 Roaming Gold)</font>)!
Active: Nearby allied heroes enter Camouflage State and their Movement Speed increases by <font color="ffe63c"> (+0.04 Roaming Gold)</font>% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage ends this state.
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.

recommendmasterplan.name: TS - SAWO
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Intelligent robot used to protect little Ailee.

assist.desc: Jawhead works best with heroes that benefit from a quick engage like Odette and Belerick because he can throw them into the enemy for a surprise attack.

strong.desc: Jawhead counters squishy heroes with no defensive skills that he can burst down after connecting with his Ultimate, such as Saber and Eudora.

weak.desc: Jawhead is countered by heroes with high sustained damage or high survivability, like Edith and Thamuz, because they can survive Jawhead's burst damage and beat him in a prolonged battle.
